ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.NAME: My name is Amanda Rodrigues da Silva.
ABOUT.EXPERIENCE: I don't have much experience, but I am seeking new opportunities that will help me.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.TEXT_RIGHT: I began by studying front-end, focusing on HTML and CSS. Then i started to focus on Analysis and Systems Development through comprehensive online courses and university studies. Consequently, I acquired skills in applying the Java language for SQL database manipulation, including CRUD operations. Java was my first programming language, and currently, I am directing my studies towards Angular, Java Script Spring, and SAP.
